text: Karlheinz Hackl (16 May 1949 - 1 June 2014) was an Austrian actor, singer and theater director. His best known movie roles are Sophie's Choice (1982) and The Wall (2012). Hackl was born in Vienna. In 1997, he married Austrian actress Maria KÃ¶stlinger. Hackl died from a malignant brain tumor on 1 June 2014 in Vienna, aged 65. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1949 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Vienna Category:Austrian movie actors Category:Austrian stage actors Category:Austrian television actors Category:Cancer deaths in Austria Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Singers from Vienna
title: Karlheinz Hackl
